name: Hot Gardening_Prototype
description:
You're an astronaut that crash landed into a planet with extreme hot temperature. Your goal is to survive as best as you can by planting food, upgrading your tools and trying to look for a way out of the planet!

Controls:

WASD - Move

I - Toggle inventory

E - Interact

Left Mouse Button - Water Plants 

This is an early prototype of the game idea. What you'll see here are mostly the mechanics in a raw state. 

_____________________________________________________________________________________

Update Notes:

- Added shelter to cover player from extreme temperature.

- Plants water bar now has an icon.

- Updated the model for the garden beds.
